user_query: I'm planning a road trip with my friends and we need to find gas stations along the route. Can you help us locate nearby gas stations? Also, I'm interested in checking the horoscope compatibility between two of my friends. Furthermore, could you provide me with the contact information for hospitals along the way?

TaskList.description: Identify the starting and ending points of the road trip to determine the route.
Locate gas stations along the specified route.
Find contact information for hospitals located along the route.
Check horoscope compatibility between the two specified friends.
